title: Orphaned Account Cleanup
description: An analyst must run a report to find 'orphaned' accounts (accounts that are not associated with a current employee) and disable them.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all active user accounts from Active Directory.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst has a complete list of all active accounts.

tasks.description: Generate a list of all current employees from the HR system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst has a complete list of all active employees.

tasks.description: Compare the two lists to find accounts that do not have a corresponding active employee, then disable these orphaned accounts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully identifies and disables several orphaned accounts, reducing the organization's attack surface.
